oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band - Bear Creek Hop / Orange Blossom Special excerpts and medley
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpts of Bob Bruce of Leon McAuliffe's Western Swing Band performing Bear Creek Hop and Orange Blossom Special, followed by a medley of the two evidently cut together from the individual recordings.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Leon McAuliffe; Western Swing Band (Leon McAuliffe)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Bear Creek Hop (Bob Bruce fiddle, Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Orange Blossom Special (Bob Bruce fiddle, Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Orange Blossom Special (Bob Bruce fiddle, Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) (excerpt) -- Orange Blossom Special (Bob Bruce fiddle, Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) (excerpt) -- Bear Creek Hop / Orange Blossom Special / Bear Creek Hop / Orange Blossom Special / Bear Creek Hop [medley] (Bob Bruce fiddle, Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- [Unidentified musical excerpt] -- [Unidentified musical excerpt]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: McAuliffe, Leon, 1917-1988; Western Swing Band (Musical group : Leon McAuliffe); Bruce, Bob;
